page.title: 16Parental Occupations
page.content: We have been asking people who live near us what their occupations are. Mrs Harkness works nights on Saturday at Alderley Edge. Her husband, Mr Harkness is a painter. Mr Mozier works in a bank. Mrs Mozier organizes plays with grown ups. Mr Benson is a retired doctor. Miss C Harkness works at the stables. Mrs Jones is a hairdesser. Mrs R Williams is a housewife. Mrs Swamm is a housewife as well. Mrs Cocmen is a teacher at Lauriston High School. Mrs Richards works part-time at a hairdressers. Mr C Richards is a full-time sales manager and he works all over the country. His office is in London and he goes there once a week. Miss Turner is a housewife, Mrs Ann Barger is a teacher. We hope this tells you more about our area.
